snippet.title: MD Moving Adventure Psy-O-Blade
snippet.description:
"Moving Adventure Psy-O-Blade" just got it's first English beta release! It's a very cool sci-fi horror adventure game that was originally released on PC in 1988 an ported to Megadrive in 1990. It's a very interesting mix of "Snatcher" style adventure, "Phantasy Star" style dungeon crawling and even "Space Harrier" style shmup! Very neat little package, looking forward to the finished English patch.

Want to help? You can do so by reporting bugs at Romhacking.net:

http://www.romhacking.net/forum/index.php/topic,18846.msg267987.html#msg267987

*UPDATE* Final patch version is out.
Romhacking.net project page: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/2308/
